VAV box damper model. Calculates the pressure drop and flow rate given a control signal and considering a number of possible faults. More...

#include "spark.h"
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

Include dependency graph for VAV_damper.cc:

Detailed Description

VAV box damper model. Calculates the pressure drop and flow rate given a control signal and considering a number of possible faults.

Interface variables
  • port damp_pos "damper position (0=closed, 1=open)" [scalar] ;
  • port p_drop "pressure drop across the VAV box" [Pa];
  • port mVAVmax "mass flow rate if damper is fully opened";
  • port StuckDamper;
  • port LeakyDamper;
  • port VAVFlowSensorOffset;
  • port FailedActuator;
  • port BoxTooBig;
  • port BoxTooSmall;
  • port mVAVreal "damper mass flow rate" [kg/s] ;
  • port mVAVmeas "measured damper mass flow rate" [-];
Functions
 mVAVreal, mVAVmeas = VAV_damper(damp_pos,p_drop,mVAVmax,StuckDamper,LeakyDamper,VAVFlowSensorOffset,FailedActuator,BoxTooBig,BoxTooSmall)
